00036  MODULE Domain
00037  USE NTypes, ONLY : DBL
00038  IMPLICIT NONE
00039  SAVE
00040 
00041 ! Time step and limits
00042  INTEGER :: iStep, tCall, tDump, tStat, MaxStep, RelaxStep
00043 
00044 ! Domain size
00045 ! (xmax, xmin) : computational domain size limits
00046 ! (xl  , xu  ) : local minimun and maximum values for x in a given processor
00047 ! (xlg , xug ) : local ghost node position (xlg = xl-1, xug = xu+1)
00048  INTEGER :: xjump, xo, yo, zo
00049  INTEGER :: now, nxt, NX, NY, NZ, NPX, NPy, NPZ
00050  INTEGER :: xmin, xmax, xl, xu, xlg, xug
00051  INTEGER :: ymin, ymax, yl, yu, ylg, yug
00052  INTEGER :: zmin, zmax, zl, zu, zlg, zug
00053  INTEGER :: xsize, xsize2, xsize3, xsize4, xsize5
00054  INTEGER :: ysize, ysize2, ysize3, ysize4, ysize5
00055  INTEGER :: zsize, zsize2, zsize3, zsize4, zsize5
00056  INTEGER :: xedge, yedge, zedge
00057 
00058 ! ndim = spatial dimension
00059  INTEGER, PARAMETER :: ndim = 3
00060 
00061 ! Array for neigbors
00062  INTEGER, ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:,:) :: ni
00063 
00064 ! Inverse of the initial volume of the discrete phase 
00065  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: invInitVol
00066 
00067 ! Define constants used in the code (inv6 = 1/6, inv12 = 1/12, invPi = 1/pi)
00068  REAL(KIND = DBL), PARAMETER :: inv6  = 0.16666666666666666667D0
00069  REAL(KIND = DBL), PARAMETER :: inv12 = 0.08333333333333333333D0
00070  REAL(KIND = DBL), PARAMETER :: invPi = 0.31830988618379067154D0
00071 
00072  END MODULE Domain

00096  MODULE LBMParams
00097  USE NTypes, ONLY : DBL
00098  IMPLICIT NONE
00099  SAVE
00100 
00101 ! fdim = order parameter dimension - 1 (D3Q7)
00102 ! gdim = momentum dimension - 1        (D3Q19)
00103  INTEGER, PARAMETER :: fdim = 6
00104  INTEGER, PARAMETER :: gdim = 18
00105 
00106 ! Distribution functions
00107  REAL(KIND = DBL), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:,:,:) :: f, g
00108 
00109 ! D3Q7/D3Q19 Lattice speed of sound (Cs = 1/DSQRT(3), Cs_sq = 1/3, invCs_sq = 3)
00110  REAL(KIND = DBL), PARAMETER :: Cs       = 0.57735026918962576451D0
00111  REAL(KIND = DBL), PARAMETER :: Cs_sq    = 0.33333333333333333333D0
00112  REAL(KIND = DBL), PARAMETER :: invCs_sq = 3.00000000000000000000D0
00113 
00114 ! Distributions weights (D3Q19: Eg0 = 1/3, Eg1 = 1/18, Eg2 = 1/36)
00115  REAL(KIND = DBL), PARAMETER :: Eg0 = 0.33333333333333333333D0
00116  REAL(KIND = DBL), PARAMETER :: Eg1 = 0.05555555555555555556D0
00117  REAL(KIND = DBL), PARAMETER :: Eg2 = 0.02777777777777777778D0
00118 
00119 ! Modified distribution weight (to avoid operations: EgiC = Egi*invCs_sq)
00120  REAL(KIND = DBL), PARAMETER :: Eg0C = 1.00000000000000000000D0
00121  REAL(KIND = DBL), PARAMETER :: Eg1C = 0.16666666666666666667D0
00122  REAL(KIND = DBL), PARAMETER :: Eg2C = 0.08333333333333333333D0
00123  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: w, Eg0n, Eg1n, Eg2n, EgC0n, EgC1n, EgC2n
00124 
00125  END MODULE LBMParams
